attributes.name: CloudWiFiSetupRK
attributes.author: rickkas7
attributes.sentence: Library for setting Wi-Fi credentials over cellular

readme:
# CloudWiFiSetupRK

*Library for setting Wi-Fi credentials over cellular*

- Repository: https://github.com/rickkas7/CloudWiFiSetupRK
- License: MIT
- [Browseable API docs](https://rickkas7.github,io/CloudWiFiSetupRK/index.html)
- [Web-based configuration tool](https://docs.particle.io/tools/cloud-tools/cloud-wifi-config/)


This library is used with the M-SoM to allow Wi-Fi credentials to be set over the cellular interface. 

You typically include the function in your regular user firmware:

- Include the `CloudWiFiSetupRK` library in your project.
- Include the header file in your main application .cpp file:

```cpp
#include "CloudWiFiSetupRK.h"
```

- Include the setup call in your setup():

```cpp
CloudWiFiSetupRK::instance().setup();
```

That's it!

The configuration tool can be found in the Particle docs at [Cloud Wi-Fi config](https://docs.particle.io/tools/cloud-tools/cloud-wifi-config/).
